questions.questionTitle: What are the speakers mainly discussing?
anwers: Cost estimates for a work project
The rising cost of work materials

questions.questionTitle: Which of the following is true?
anwers: Carlton Brothers submitted the lowest bid.
The man likes the quality of Carlton Brothers' work.
The woman is familiar with Stuller & Sons.
The board of directors must select Stuller & Sons.
Stuller & Sons will begin to work.
The company will accept more bids.
There will be a board of directors meeting.
The speakers are leaving for vacation.

script:
� So, have you had a chance to review the bids for the renovation project? What do you think?
� Well, Carlton Brothers' was the cheapest, but I'm not sold on the quality of their work. I think they cut too many corners to bring the price down. The bid from Stuller & Sons is 15 percent higher, but I think it's worth the extra cost. How about you?
� Carlton Brothers did a project for my friend's company, and she thought they did a great job. I don't know much about Stuller & Sons, but I liked some of the suggestions in their bid -- like using track lighting instead of canned. I think you're probably right.
� Let's recommend Stuller to the board of directors tomorrow, then. Of course, they still to get to vote on it, but they usually follow the staff recommendation
